Title: Relates to creating a school resource officer working group; and provides for the repeal of such provisions upon the expiration thereof
Summary: Creates a school resource officer working group to study appropriate standards and training for a person to serve as a school resource officer; provides for the repeal of such provisions upon the expiration thereof.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to creating a school resource officer working group; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon the expiration thereof
